author: Sam Ori
title: What Government Inspectors Can Learn From ‘Moneyball’
text: Sam Ori is the executive director of the Energy Policy Institute at University of Chicago. When the Oakland Athletics used statistical analysis to build their team, they became one of the winningest and most cost-effective teams in professional baseball. Their approach, which inspired the book and later movie “Moneyball,” set the standard for how to How Tech Has Undermined—and May Now Save—the Doctor-Patient Relationship Next ‘How Long Do I Have Left?’ AI Can Help Answer That Question
